name.title: Name
name.description: Plugin name as displayed in the homebridge log.

serialNumber.title: Serial number (first five digits) of your air-Q
serialNumber.description: Will be used to retrieve the IP of the air-Q device by MDNS.

password.title: Password of this air-Q
password.description: The password you gave this air-Q during its configuration.

updateInterval.title: Update Interval
updateInterval.description: The interval (in seconds) at which updates of the sensors are requested from the air-Q devices.
